TASK.TITLE: Use XUL for main window and dialogs
Support reading audio from video files
Support Linux and other Unix operating systems
Allow change logs and release notes to be shown prior to installing an update
Try to fix decoding of some MP3 files (in 'test' folder)
TASK.COMMENTS:
Note --------
- !BECrash - 15 - Ayumi Hamasaki - To Be (Bright Mix).mp3
This seems to be problem with the mpglib decoder. Even the original LAME encoder crashes upon trying to read this file.

TASK.TITLE: Add support for foobar2000 input plugins
Support the AKRip library as an alternative ripper
Support encoding with multiple rippers at once
Support multichannel audio and converting from 5.1 to stereo
Support DSP filters (esp. normalization (peak & RMS), resampling)
Implement an IO::Filter based plugin system
Support more file formats (at least APE, MAC, Speex, VQF, WMA, MPC)
Support NeroAPI for burning audio and data discs
Show status in statusbar (overall progress, 7/9 files encoded etc.)
Show more info about the CD in drive (HDCD, CDText, subchannel etc.)
Add an extension to play sounds upon specific events (such as finished encoding)
Show error status while/after ripping (error detection like in EAC)
Allow multiple selections in joblist (for "right-click action")
Add support for automatic ripping on disc insert
Allow changing the order of tracks in joblist
Write a foobar2000 plugin for Bonk
Use the Bonk library for all Bonk plugins
Add support for more than 2 channels
Add support for rebuilding the input path in the output directory
Allow setting the artist/album/genre/year fields for all tracks in joblist
Add a dialog for loading files by pattern (Madonna* etc)
Allow to select the encoding for downloaded freedb entries
Display approximate length for MP3 etc
Add title info formatting (An Artist - A Song, an artist - a song, etc.)
Add support for directory drag & drop
Add FLAC encoder
TASK.COMMENTS:
ToDo ---------
- Fehler beheben, dass LPC nicht verwendet wird

TASK.TITLE: Try to make the WMA input plugin work
Fix problems with BonkEnc being installed in Unicode path
Add support for ripping to a single file
Add support for LAME mono mode
Add support for encoding to the same directory as the input file is in
Add support for deleting original files after encoding
Allow to specify a naming pattern and output directory for playlists
Enhance support for various artist CDs
